```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(fuzzyjoin)
library(stringdist)
```

```{r}
# reading in data
data1 <- read_csv("./data/14_06_2023_ArmorR.csv") %>% select(c(2:5))
data2 <- read_csv("./data/14_06_2023_AviationR.csv") %>% select(c(2:5))
```

```{r}
# trying fuzzy matching on vectors
v1 <- data1$Assignment
v2 <- data2$Assignment
v3 <- amatch(v1, v2, maxDist = 25)
```

```{r}
columns <- c("v1", "v2", "v3", "v4")
dataframe <- data.frame(matrix(nrow = 67, ncol = length(columns)))
colnames(dataframe) <- columns
dataframe[1:61,1] <- v1
dataframe$v2 <- v2
dataframe[1:61,3] <- v3

if (isTRUE(is.na(v3))) {
  dataframe$v4 <- dataframe$v1
} else {
  dataframe$v4 <- dataframe$v2[dataframe$v3]
}
```
